Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near the area of Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
